info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 8:31PM MST until December 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: 731 PM PST Thu Dec 30 2021 /831 PM MST Thu Dec 30 2021/ ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ FRIDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau. In Nevada, Lincoln County, Sheep Range and Spring Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways leading to Mt Charleston including Highways 156 , 157, and 158 will be snow covered at times. Mountain roads in Lincoln and northern Mohave county will also be impacted including highway 389 between Colorado City and Fredonia.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
